html:
3i Inc, a metaverse technology company, has raised USD23.5 million in series A venture funding led by KDB Industrial Bank, SV Investment, LB Investment, and DS Asset Management YG Investment and Intops Investment Enlight Ventures, NBH Capital, and Korea Asset Investment & Securities

Financial investors (FI), and YG Investment and Intops Investment newly participated as strategic investors (SI), investing a total of 23 billion won, and existing investors In Enlight Ventures, NBH Capital, and Korea Asset Investment & Securities.

Deal In Brief

Deal Value (US$ Million)23.52
Deal TypeVenture Finance
Sub-CategoryStart-up
Deal StatusCompleted: 2021-09-23

Deal Participants

Target (Company)3i Inc
Acquirer 1 (Company)Korea Development Bank
Acquirer 2 (Company)Sv Investment Co.
Acquirer 3 (Company)YG Investment Inc.
Acquirer 4 (Company)Korea Asset Investment Securities Co.,Ltd.
Acquirer 5 (Company)DS Asset Management
Acquirer 6 (Company)Intops Investment
Acquirer 7 (Company)Enlight Ventures
Acquirer 8 (Company)LB Investments
Acquirer 9 (Company)NBH Capital

Deal Rationale

3I plans to use the funds raised this time to develop new products and expand the Metaverse platform business. The strategy is to promote active marketing to increase brand awareness in the global market and expand sales outlets.
